content: this is just what the name suggests - an easy dishcloth pattern ideal for beginners you need to make chain stitches & single_crochet stitches and that s it it s very easy to make the dishcloth wider & longer and turn it into a towel if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks
